description: Arguably one of the most beautiful parrots, the Scarlet Macaw is a stunning bird with brilliant red plumage, a band of bright yellow on its wings, tipped with blue.
temperament: High-energy, intelligent, and bold. They can be quite feisty, willful, and nippy, requiring an experienced owner who can provide consistent training and socialization.
loudness: Extremely Loud. Their call is a very loud, high-pitched, and harsh screech that is designed to carry over long distances.
vocalization: Fair talking ability, but they are more known for their screaming. They can learn words and phrases but may not have great clarity.
dietaryNeeds: A diet rich in fats is essential. This includes a base of formulated pellets, plus a generous amount of nuts, fruits, and vegetables daily.
healthPointers: Can live 50-75+ years. Prone to feather-plucking due to boredom or stress. Also susceptible to PDD and Pacheco's disease.
housing: Needs a very large cage or aviary (minimum 48"W x 36"D x 72"H) and a lot of time outside the cage for exercise. Not suitable for apartments under any circumstances.
